description: This file defines a PlaybackService class that manages local music playback state, including play, pause, toggle, seek, and setTrack functionalities. It acts as a stub with no integrated audio backend, simulating playback behavior using timers and streams.

classes.name: PlaybackService
classes.description: A service class that manages local playback state, streams, and track info for a music player.

methods.name: setTrack
methods.description: Sets the current track with title, artist, and optional duration, resetting playback state.

methods.name: play
methods.description: Starts playback and begins position updates.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles between play and pause states.

methods.name: seek
methods.description: Seeks to a specified position within the track, clamping to track duration.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Cleans up resources by canceling timers and closing streams.
